name: Poop Shooter
description:
An amazingly Poopy game for that friend that is a big poop or even that time when you might need to poop. Distract yourself from the fact that you will never be able to beat my high score and that may bother you forever. But that's alright send me 5 bucks for this game and I will relieve you of this guilt! Thanks for playing my game. It's my first one, and probably not the last. 

Directions: Move your Poop Hero: Ch0nkla back and forth in order to dodge the vicious poop eating rats that just might take your life and destroy all of poopdom! Oh No! Collect a poop's favorite food: Beans, Corn, Teeth, and Donut THINGS!

#PoopGame #PoopShooter #Poop #FunnyPoop #PoopMeme
